#Adding Security Headers Everywhere!
Today, we [pushed](https://jenkins.mofoprod.net/job/PRODPUSH-studiomofo/10/console) a new version of [Studiomofo](http://studiomofo.org) to address [HSTS](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_Strict_Transport_Security), [X-Frame-Options](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/X-Frame-Options) (we're set to DENY), and [Cross-site Scripting](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-site_scripting).
Here's the [code I added to do it](https://github.com/mozilla/studiomofo/pull/3/files)

![alt text](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/2273146/studiomofo-secheaders.JPG "Safety First")
